comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Sounds like a great group. Alas, this double-digit IQ won't be dragging down today's brain train. Have fun.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I was hub to hub w/ Dr. Z when the Columbian Express rolled through. She attacked just above the Boat Ramp and put a good fifty yards on us in the time it takes to say "SchicklegrÃ¼ber." Tom countered w/ a vicious, animatronic sprint. My response was more stately, of course, and by the time I caught up w/ the bunch, they were back on campus, discussing something like _the categorical imperative and its sidelong effect on free markets in developing societies._ I nodded and agreed. DU
